beam_distributed_load_spring_support_squ.description: Beam structure with distributed triangular load, spring support, and square cross-section showing dimensions 2ℓ, k, ℓ, and diamond-shaped section with area A

diamond_cross_section_shear_forces.png.description: Diamond-shaped cross-section diagram showing shear force distribution with dimensions a/√2 and force q at corners

beam_segment_free_body_diagram.png.description: Free body diagram of beam segment showing distributed load q, triangular load, moment W, shear force T, and horizontal force H with coordinate system

beam_spring_support_reactions.png.description: Beam with spring support showing reaction forces X and S, with distributed triangular load and moment W at right end

rectangular_frame_three_beams.png.description: Rectangular frame structure with three beams, horizontal force P at left, pin supports at corners, and unknown reaction force H at right

frame_real_system_numbered_joints.png.description: Real system diagram showing rectangular frame with force P, numbered joints (1,2,3), pin supports, and vertical reaction V=P

frame_dummy_system_unit_load.png.description: Dummy system diagram of rectangular frame with pin supports and unit vertical load V=0 at right support

two_beam_hinged_system_springs.png.description: Two-beam hinged system with vertical forces W and F, spring supports k and kt, showing beam #1 (EJ,ℓ) and beam #2 (2EJ,ℓ) connected by hinges

two_beam_displacement_field_coordinates..description: Solution diagram for two-beam system showing displacement field coordinates, hinges, spring supports, and force F with coordinate axes x1, x2, z1, z2, w1, w2

three_cell_rectangular_section.png.description: Three-cell rectangular cross-section showing dimensions a (width of each cell) and a (height), with pin joints at corners

three_cell_section_shear_flows.png.description: Three-cell section solution diagram showing applied moment Mt and shear flows q1, q2, q3 with rotation arrows in each cell

thin_walled_beam_uniform_pressure_trapez.description: Thin-walled beam with uniform pressure p on top, showing side view with section A marked at e/6 from left support, and trapezoidal cross-section with dimensions a, b, c

beam_pressure_to_rib_forces.png.description: Side view of thin-walled beam showing distributed pressure p converted to concentrated forces F at ribs, with section A marked and trapezoidal cross-section detail

cantilever_beam_distributed_load_square_.description: Cantilever thin-walled beam with distributed load q along length ℓ, showing 3D isometric view with e/6 dimension and square cross-section with dimensions a and panel thickness t

cantilever_load_distribution_rib_forces..description: Solution diagram showing cantilever beam with distributed load q converted to concentrated forces F, F/2 at ribs, with coordinate system and length dimensions ℓ and e/6

beam_segment_rib_forces_rotations.png.description: Beam segment showing six concentrated forces F (with F/2 at ends) applied at ribs, with rotation angles θ1 and θ2 marked at supports
